definition: A term used to describe the deliberate and unauthorized attempts made by individuals to gain access to a property or premises, typically with the intention of committing theft or other illegal activities.

examples.german: Die Polizei hat mehrere Einbruchsversuchen in der Gegend gemeldet.
examples.english: The police have reported several attempted break-ins in the area.

examples.german: Der Alarm hat die Einbruchsversuchen erfolgreich abgewehrt.
examples.english: The alarm successfully deterred the attempted break-ins.

examples.german: Es gab keine Hinweise auf Einbruchsversuchen an der Tür.
examples.english: There were no signs of attempted break-ins at the door.
The security measures prevented attempted break-ins.

examples.german: Die Einbruchsversuchen wurden von der Überwachungskamera aufgezeichnet.
examples.english: The attempted break-ins were recorded by the surveillance camera.
